\begin{problem}
Assume that $\sigma$ is a good function and $\sigma= \sigma_0 + l
u_0$ where $u_0$ is the step function with a step at $t=0$. Can we
conclude that $\sigma_0$ is sub-additive ? \sol{ No, see textbook
for a counter-example. }
\end{problem}
